ProductInfo.Features:
Microsoft Office 2013 RT Open, edit and create files with touch optimized versions of Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote included. Built-in dual position kickstand The sturdy Kickstand now features 2 positions, making Surface 2 comfortable to use on your lap or at a desk.
Fast processor Surface 2 runs on the NVIDIA Tegra 4 processor, making it one of the fastest tablets on the market. 10.6" Full HD widescreen display ClearType technology and 1920 x 1080 resolution offers crisp visuals and easy navigation. Auto-adjusting screen intensity gives you the clearest picture possible, whether you're indoors or out.
Front- and rear-facing 1080p video cameras Surface 2 includes a 3.5-megapixel camera on the front and a 5-megapixel camera on the back making face-to-face conversations with your favorite people crisp and clear.
Skype? and SkyDrive? With Surface 2, get 1 year of unlimited free voice calling to landlines in over 60 countries, and free Skype Wi-Fi at over 2 million hotspots worldwide. You also get 200GB additional SkyDrive storage for 2 years.
Beautifully entertaining. Enjoy HD movies on a brilliant 1080p widescreen display. Stream millions of songs for free and import your iTunes playlist through Xbox Music.
ProductInfo.Name: 2014 New Microsoft Surface 2 Tablet - Windows RT 8.1, 10.6" 1920x1080 LCD Touchscreen, Front and Rear Camera Office RT 2013 Included (32, A Tablet Only)
